#summary Super Server (RH7 based).

= Introduction =

Super server based on CentOS7: VMS, LDAP, all-in-one.

= 0. Pre-req =
 * LAN:
  * LAN: 192.168.0.0/24
  * gw: 192.168.0.254
  * vms: 192.168.0.2
  * server: 192.168.0.1
 * smb:
  * domain: office
 * ldap:
  * base: dc=ldap
  * manager: binddn="cn=...", password=secredpass

= 1. Any CentOS =
 * download [http://mirror.yandex.ru/centos/7.0.1406/isos/x86_64/CentOS-7.0-1406-x86_64-Minimal.iso CentOS7-mini], burn it.
 * install
 * patch selinux (/etc/sysconfig/selinux)
 * patch network (/etc/sysconfig/networking, /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/e*-)
 * add repos (epel, rpmfussion)
 * yum install mc rpmreaper
 * init 6
 * remove unwanted (rpmreaper)
 * update
